nodes.text: Rednax was a Dug from Malastare. In 22 BBY he conversed with Seboca and Slyther Bushforb in Dex's Diner, seated two booths behind Obi-Wan Kenobi. He wore a dark gray outfit.

Behind the Magic erroneously states that Rednax is the other Dug with the red leather jacket - Seboca. Leland Chee and most other sources confirm that Rednax is the Dug in the dark gray outfit with the back of his spotted neck to the camera behind Obi-Wan.
